text: Hopelessness has surprised me with patience.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley

text: Find patience in the breath of life.
author: Ryunosuke Satoro

text: The greatest power is often simple patience.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

text: How can a society that exists on instant mashed potatoes, packaged cake mixes, frozen dinners, and instant cameras teach patience to its young?
author: Paul Sweeney

text: Gardeners are good at nurturing, and they have a great quality of patience, they're tender. They have to be persistent.
author: Ralph Fiennes
